thread.title: 10 pairs of kitten heels that need to make it to your wardrobe this season
thread.title_full: 10 pairs of kitten heels that need to make it to your wardrobe this season

author: Ellie Pithers
title: 10 pairs of kitten heels that need to make it to your wardrobe this season
text:
Next 
Super platform slides, satin pumps, bejewelled sandals, thigh-high skin-tight boots – there are myriad shoes vying for your attention on the spring/summer 2017 shoe rack. But the one that’s really ticking all the have-to-have-it (shoe) boxes for the new season; the one that is so sensible, so conventional, so utterly mumsy that it suddenly feels ripe for a revamp? Enter the kitten heel. 
Yes, really. We’ve seen your Twitter comments and memes decrying the return of the itsy bitsy heel on the catwalks of Prada, Loewe, Gucci, Vetements. We are unmoved. For podiatric comfort and style kudos there is no shoe better suited for your feet right now than the low-slung court. Wear them with high-waisted jeans and a supersize blazer. And revel in their wildly seditious effect. 1 /10 Gold cylinder heel ballet show, J.W. Anderson, Rs 56,935 Dior ribbon-detail kitten heels, Dior, price on request Donna, Prada, Rs 92,680 Suede mules, Uterqüe, Rs 7,065 Daisy embellishes suede pumps, Fabrizio Vit, Rs 56,100 Coco suede and moire pumps, The Row, Rs 57,350 Sling back kitten heel satin pumps, Gianvito Rossi, Rs 36,570 D’orsay sequin pumps, Balenciaga, Rs 61,920 Autobann in black combination, Kurt Geiger, Rs 9,970 Joanna slingback heels, Boden, Rs 9,140 
This article originally appeared on Vogue.co.uk
